post.description: Creates a new club for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves clubs. Supports search, pagination, and filtering.

put.description: Updates an existing club for the authenticated user.

delete.description: Deletes an existing club for the authenticated user.

post.description: Accept a join request (invite) for a club. Only the owner can do this.

delete.description: Exit (leave) a club. The creator cannot leave their own club.

post.description: Invite a user to a club. Only the owner can do this.
Join a club. If the club is private, it creates an invite request.
Join a club using an invite ID. Works for both user-specific and open invites.
Creates a new leaderboard for the authenticated user. Allows specifying a name, optional description, club association, visibility, and an optional expiry date.

get.description: Retrieves leaderboards for the authenticated user. Supports search, pagination, and filtering by club, creator, or status.

put.description: Updates an existing leaderboard for the authenticated user.

delete.description: Deletes an existing leaderboard for the authenticated user.

post.description: Accept a join request (invite) for a leaderboard. Only the creator can do this.

delete.description: Exit (leave) a leaderboard. The creator cannot leave their own leaderboard.

post.description: Invite a user to a leaderboard. Only the owner can do this.
Join a leaderboard. If the leaderboard is private, it creates a join request.
Join a club using an invite ID. Works for both user-specific and open invites.

requestBody.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token. Currently supports Nike (NRC) login via puppeteer

get.description: Strava OAuth callback handler. Exchanges the authorization code for an access token and establishes a user session.
Retrieves notifications for the authenticated user. Supports filtering by type, read status, and pagination.
Retrieves the authenticated user's profile, including clubs and leaderboards.

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's username or avatar.
